en: "You should give up, you will never leave this place."
zh_TW: "妳應該放棄了，妳是沒辦法離開這裡的。"

en: The figures stare at you from the other side of the windows.
zh_TW: 身影從窗戶另一側凝視著妳。

en: Your mother will be devastated to learn that she's now completely alone.
zh_TW: 妳的母親在知道自己即將孤身一人會崩潰的。

en: No husband, no daughter. Everybody left her. How pitiful.
zh_TW: 沒了丈夫，沒了女兒。所有人都離開了她。真是可憐。

en: How dare you... say something like that...
The door is stuck. It won't open.
zh_TW: 門被卡住了。沒辦法打開。
